summary: BTS Reaction you rapping about mental health issues
title: BTS Reaction you rapping about mental health issues
body:
SEOKJIN-

Of course Seokjin would find it inspiring that somebody so young could say such bold things, especially in an industry like this one. To him, you would be an icon of everything that he’s too scared to say out loud for fear of being viewed as “troubled” or “struggling”. Your courage would run deep through him, inspiring something deep in his chest.

Of course, not everybody would love your music– some would find it too “emotional”, or not “hype” enough, and often times Seokjin would get made fun of for bothering to listen to your music. It wouldn’t bother him one bit, because though they might not see it, Seokjin would know that whenever he listened to you rap about you and your struggles, he gets a surge of empowerment. Your music would have the physical power to make Seokjin feel less alone, and that’s a damn good thing.

YOONGI-

Yoongi takes his music seriously. For him, music is a sense of self expression that nobody can touch or dictate. Music is filled with endless possibilities, and stories waiting to be told to anybody who would listen. When Yoongi first heard one of your songs, he was overwhelmed with emotion and feelings because it just hit so close to home. Nobody in his life ever understood why exactly he was so obsessed with you and your music, but whenever it came up in conversation, Yoongi would be quick to make sure they knew that whatever they said, however they ridiculed your style, he would always support you.

HOSEOK-

It’s no secret that Jung Hoseok often tried to hide his emotions and true feelings from the majority of people, so when he heard about this rising rapper who used their influence to talk about their own struggles with the hope of reaching out to others, he would be in awe. It’s not very often that he shows even his bandmates what he’s truly feeling inside, so seeing somebody so open about their own hardships and issues would make him feel 100% less alone for sure.

Perhaps your music could even inspire him to be more open himself and begin to open up to the boys he trusted. 

NAMJOON-

Namjoon often tries to put his own hardships into his music as best as he can, but sometimes he finds that he falls short. It’s not an easy thing to do, trying to humanize yourself and relate with your following, but Namjoon is trying his best. When he found out about you and your style, he would do everything in his power to support you, because he knows how risky and difficult it can be to talk about one’s problems. Sometimes he’d find himself absentmindedly listening to your most powerful pieces while he tries to write his own songs, finding that the emotion can flow much easier. 

Maybe it’s the fact that he feels more validated, or maybe it’s that he knows he’s not the only risk-taker in this industry, but when he thinks about your influence and how people view you and your work, it gives him courage and strength. 

JIMIN-

Jimin would love your music for the raw emotion that you rapped with. Although normally Jimin likes songs that are more upbeat, your music’s lyrics would just stick with him. He’d often write them down in notebooks whenever they get too stuck in his head. If anybody ever teased him about liking your music, he’d just blush and tell them that you’re good, no matter what they thought.

As an artist himself, Jimin would be inspired by your music style to be more genuine in his own.

TAEHYUNG-

Taehyung always has a bright, sunny personality, but lord knows he has his down moments. When he stumbled across one of your music videos one night before bed, he was immediately intrigued by how unique it was. After that, every time he was feeling less than good, he’d isolate himself and listen to your music. In a way, it would soothe him. It’d help him see the things that were bothering him in a whole new light, and he would be surprised at how much he related to your situation.

Taehyung would find that your music touches him unlike any music he’s heard from any other artists. To him, you were something like a poet, or a God with words. 

JUNGKOOK-

When Jungkook first realized that he liked your music and related to it, he would be a bit embarrassed. He wouldn’t want his Hyung’s to know that listening to songs about overcoming mental problems soothed him, for fear of them thinking differently of him. He wouldn’t really understand why he felt this way, because it’s just a preference of music. However, Jungkook would be scared that they wouldn’t think of your music the same way that he does, and he wouldn’t want anything to ruin the special bond that he created with your music and you. 

Jungkook would think so highly of you for being able to confront your demons like this, and would be so insanely impressed that you have enough courage to share it with the world.

If anybody ever teased him about liking your music, he’d just blush and tell them that you’re good, no matter what they thought.

As an artist himself, Jimin would be inspired by your music style to be more genuine in his own.

TAEHYUNG-

Taehyung always has a bright, sunny personality, but lord knows he has his down moments. When he stumbled across one of your music videos one night before bed, he was immediately intrigued by how unique it was. After that, every time he was feeling less than good, he’d isolate himself and listen to your music. In a way, it would soothe him. It’d help him see the things that were bothering him in a whole new light, and he would be surprised at how much he related to your situation.

Taehyung would find that your music touches him unlike any music he’s heard from any other artists. To him, you were something like a poet, or a God with words. 

JUNGKOOK-

When Jungkook first realized that he liked your music and related to it, he would be a bit embarrassed. He wouldn’t want his Hyung’s to know that listening to songs about overcoming mental problems soothed him, for fear of them thinking differently of him. He wouldn’t really understand why he felt this way, because it’s just a preference of music. However, Jungkook would be scared that they wouldn’t think of your music the same way that he does, and he wouldn’t want anything to ruin the special bond that he created with your music and you. 

Jungkook would think so highly of you for being able to confront your demons like this, and would be so insanely impressed that you have enough courage to share it with the world.
trail.content_abstract:
SEOKJIN-

Of course Seokjin would find it inspiring that somebody so young could say such bold things, especially in an industry like this one. To him, you would be an icon of everything that he’s too scared to say out loud for fear of being viewed as “troubled” or “struggling”. Your courage would run deep through him, inspiring something deep in his chest.

Of course, not everybody would love your music– some would find it too “emotional”, or not “hype” enough, and often times Seokjin would get made fun of for bothering to listen to your music. It wouldn’t bother him one bit, because though they might not see it, Seokjin would know that whenever he listened to you rap about you and your struggles, he gets a surge of empowerment. Your music would have the physical power to make Seokjin feel less alone, and that’s a damn good thing.
